howItWorks.title: How Training Works
howItWorks.content: Practice quiz questions in a spaced repetition system one question at a time. If there are no questions due, you can still practice in the unrated mode, which will not affect the leaderboard.

leagues.title: Leagues and Scoring
leagues.content: You can participate in a leaderboard against other students in the same league. The settings for the leaderboard can be changed in the user settings.

scoring.content: Answer questions correctly to collect points and rank up to higher leagues. The more often a question is answered correctly in a row, the more points you earn for it.

quizTraining.showInLeaderboard: Show my name in the quiz leaderboard
